decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The hereby approved use shall cease 12 months after the date of this decision and the site shall be restored to its previous state.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Site location plan, covering letter dated 14th July 2017, Received: 24th July 2017. F&D Motor Sales Operating Statement and 16011/TP/1001 B. received: 25th September 2017 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The hereby approved use for car sales shall not be carried out outside of the following times: Monday to Saturday 9am to 6pm.

Condition : 4 - The hereby approved use shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the F&D Motor Sales Operating Statement received: 25th September 2017 for the duration of the use. No deliveries or collections shall be carried out by a transporter.

Condition : 5 - Prior to the commencement of the use suitable fencing shall be erected around the site as shown on plan number 16011/TP/1001 B received: 25th September 2017 and shall be maintained as such for the duration of the use.

Condition : 6 - Only vehicles associated with the hereby approved use shall be granted access via Wellington Road North. No other vehicles associated with any other use shall be granted access to any other part of the site known as 152 Bath Road, Hounslow for the duration of the use.

Condition : 7 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.
description: Temporary use of land for car sales for a period of twelve months
